channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Emptoris Spend Analysis
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Emptoris Spend Analysis

item.title: CVE-2019-4482|2024-09-16T19:24:08.116Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20spend%20analysis
item.description: IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis 10.1.0 through 10.1.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 164066.
